name: Wood Golem
immunities: cold, lightning, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Alarm
traits.desc: Whenever a creature other than its creator comes within 60 feet of the golem, it releases an audible alarm sound which can be heard out to a range of 300 feet.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapon
traits.desc: The golem’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wood golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
